DOC.brief_summary: Prevnar (7 valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine [7vPnC]) has been shown to be effective against ear infections in children. Prevnar 13 is a new vaccine that is similar to Prevnar. It is expected that the effectiveness of Prevnar 13 against ear infections in children will be similar to that observed following Prevnar. Pfizer has committed to conduct a postmarketing study of the impact of Prevnar 13 in reducing ear infections among children.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Prevnar 13 on Ear Infections in Children
DOC.detailed_description: Infants who have completed the Prevnar 13 infant vaccination series who provide consent and fit the study inclusion criteria to participate in the study will be recruited.
DOC.criteria: Subject has received full (3dose) infant series of Prevnar 13 Prior vaccination with any 7vPnC. Prior vaccination with 23valent pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine (23vPS). Any major illness/condition that, in the investigator's judgment, will substantially increase the risk associated with the subject's participation in the study.
